## MathRadical.Degree 属性

角度参数

```csharp
public IMathElement Degree { get; }
```

### 示例

示例:

```csharp
[C#]
MathRadical radical = new MathRadical(new MathematicalText("x"), new MathematicalText("3"));
IMathElement degreeElem = radical.Degree;
```
